name: Extremophile (Louis)
description:
Runner-up for the Gameplay Award in the 2023 Global Game Jam at Georgia Institute of Technology.

A 2D platformer that your dead body and spore bullets form a bouncy platform to help you to get through the levels.

Use the arrow keys [←] and [→] to move, [↑] to jump, die on spikes to form a bouncy platform, and [x] to shoot spore bullets that grow mushrooms on glowing walls.
